meanings.sent1: After the long hike, the hungry hiker gormandized the sandwich in seconds.
meanings.sent2: During the feast, he gormandized on the delicious buffet spread.
meanings.sent3: The raccoon gormandized on the stolen cookies, leaving a trail of crumbs behind.
meanings.sent4: She gormandized the knowledge from the book, devouring each page eagerly.
meanings.sent5: The child gormandized the candy, savoring each sweet bite.

meanings.definition: To consume food in large quantities.
meanings.sent1: At the party, the guests gormandized on the tasty treats.
meanings.sent2: During the holiday season, people tend to gormandize on festive meals.
meanings.sent3: The competitive eater gormandized the hot dogs, setting a new record.
meanings.sent4: The buffet was so tempting that she gormandized without restraint.
meanings.sent5: The picnic was a success as everyone gormandized on the delicious picnic food.
